specialAbilities.name: Pack Tactics
specialAbilities.description: The shark has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the shark's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

specialAbilities.name: Water Breathing
specialAbilities.description: The shark can breathe only underwater.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.
